MetadataPackage.name: MetadataPackage
MetadataPackage.description: Represents a package that has been developed in the org you’re logged in to. Applies to unlocked, unmanaged, first-generation, and second-generation managed packages.

NamespacePrefix.description: For first-generation and second-generation managed packages, and unlocked packages with namespaces, this field is the namespace prefix assigned to the package. For unmanaged packages, or no-namespace unlocked packages, this field is blank.

PackageCategory.description: The type of package. Valid values are: Application (internal use only) Module (internal use only) Package—Represents either an unmanaged package or a first-generation managed package. Package2—Represents either an unlocked package or a second-generation managed package. The default value is Package. This field is available in API version 49.0 and later.
